alert.note: Alert for Early; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 11:01AM EDT until March 25 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT/1045 AM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN HOUSTON...SOUTHWESTERN EARLY AND NORTHWESTERN SEMINOLE COUNTIES... At 1101 AM EDT/1001 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cottonwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Ashford, Avon, Gordon, Jakin, Saffold, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Howards Mill, Lovetown, Sealy Springs, Killarney, Riverturn, Chattahoochee SP, Lucy, Farley Nuclear Plant and Cedar Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
